product_name: Platypus plusBottle 1-Liter Water Bottle with Push/Pull Cap
long_description: Now more durable and flexible than ever, the taste-free Platypus plusBottleTM water bottle with push/pull cap is an excellent option for bringing water on your backcountry adventures.
